ISSUE.TITLE: Prediction cone values are different in MMOL setting
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The prediction cone looks different in MMOL setting because the BG values are rounded to integer values. When the values are rounded to 1 decimal the prediction values look better in MMOL setting.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #406 from Trusties13/dev Syntax error in "Enable Alarms" help prompt

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #405 from nightscout/wip/mmol-cone-fix don't round the predicted values when mmol display mode (fixes #402)
